forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: when told by body teleport pressed

comments.text: i would like to see a on teleport tell like with deleting and context lasers. this could be used to recreate rec room's old teleport gun, or simply have our hand start glowing.
